Only 3/7 R sessions in history have proper R#NNN markers (43%). s1387 has empty note, s1388 has diagnostic note without R# marker, s1368 has preamble fragment, s1363 has 'session started, awaiting completion'. Previous audit reported STABLE based on s1383 having R#223 marker. However, 4 of 7 R sessions now have quality issues. This may be a note-quality hook gap — the hook catches some patterns but not all.

recommended_actions.description: R session note quality regressed to 43% (3/7 have proper R#NNN markers). s1387 has empty note, s1388 has diagnostic content without R# marker, s1368 has preamble fragment. The 40-note-quality.sh hook catches some patterns but misses: (1) completely empty notes, (2) diagnostic/analysis content that lacks a completion R# marker.
recommended_actions.action: Enhance 40-note-quality.sh to detect empty notes and notes that contain analysis/diagnostic content but lack the R#NNN completion marker. The hook should flag any R session note that doesn't contain 'R#' followed by digits.

recommended_actions.description: Brainstorming pipeline has only 1 active idea remaining (work-queue auto-scoping from outcome history). Pipeline will starve next cycle if not replenished.
recommended_actions.action: Next R session should generate 3-5 fresh brainstorming ideas to replenish the pipeline. This is a recurring pattern — brainstorming gets depleted as B sessions consume ideas faster than R sessions generate them.
